import React from 'react'; import Search from './Search'; const Home1 = ({data}) => { const background=`${data?.weather[0]?.main}.jpg`; const icon=`${data?.weather[0]?.main}.png` var today = new Date(); const day=['Sun','Mon','Tue','Wed','Thu','Fri','Sat'] console.log(data) return (
{Math.round(data?.main.temp-273.15)}℃

  

{data?.name}

{day[today.getDay()]}, {data?.weather[0].description}

Humidity {data?.main.humidity} %
Visibility {data?.visibility} meter
Wind {data?.wind.speed} m/sec
); }; export default Home1;
